Mendokusai

Tartarus

Snow

27 Feb 2018

It snowed today in Guernsey, something which only happens every few years. It was indescribably beautiful, and even better, it is supposed to snow tomorrow and the day after too - I am so excited. Charlie is unsurprisingly excited too as he gets the day off school.
